Just updated chat.fhir.org to 1.6 (painless and fast experience â€” thanks!). I'm reading http://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/prod-customize.html for info on how to customize the login screen like chat.zulip.org has done:

pasted image
Could someone point me to the docs (or just the right technique)?
More specific question: is there a way to set a realm logo and description for an existing realm without making direct db changes?
You should be able to go the gear menu and then "Manage Organization".
Then in "Organization Settings" you should find some useful stuff to modify.
(Also, congrats on the painless/fast upgrade, and thanks for letting us know. )

Oh how delightful: there's actually a UI! Should I create a GH issue for "document the existence of this UI in https://zulipchat.com/help/getting-your-organization-started-with-zulip or http://zulip.readthedocs.io/en/latest/prod-customize.html"?)
Yeah, I think an issue would be helpful. Probably the getting-started doc would be a good place to highlight this fairly prominently, huh?
Yeah, it's meant to be documented in the second bullet in https://zulipchat.com/help/getting-your-organization-started-with-zulip, but I guess it's not really clear at all :/
